name: Takamo Universe: a strategic sci-fi MMO (Canceled)
blurb: A strategic sci fi MMO set in a persistent expanding universe based on the original TAKAMO, a pbm that was launched in 1982.

rewards.reward: No Reward
A Takamo Universe digital wallpaper as a thank you!
Colonial Veterans: veteran Takamo and other veteran PBM players get into the beta at $15. Just post on our Kickstarter comment board to let us know which PBM game you played.
Five MP3 downloads from the game soundtrack, a behind-the-scenes digital art piece, and credit as a backer on our website.
Beta access, one-month subscription, and credit as a backer on our website.
5 tech advances (see "Tech advances" section), download of original game soundtrack, one-month subscription, beta access, and credit as a backer on our website.
10 tech advances, download of original game soundtrack, two-month subscription, beta access, and credit as a backer on our website.
15 tech advances, download of original game soundtrack, two-month subscription, beta access, and credit as a backer on our website.

20 tech advances, special hull frame (see "Design your own star ship" and following sections), download of original game soundtrack, two-month subscription, beta access, and credit as a backer on our website.
Digital art packet, 25 tech advances, special hull frame, download of original game soundtrack, two-month subscription, beta access, and credit as a backer on our website.
Two special hull frames, 30 tech advances, digital art packet, download of original game soundtrack, two-month subscription, beta access, and credit as a backer on our website.

Named in game credits, 35 tech advances, digital art packet, two special hull frames, download of original game soundtrack, three-month subscription, beta access, and credit as a backer on our website.

Name a star,  40 tech advances, named in game credits, digital art packet, two special hull frames, download of original game soundtrack, three-month subscription, beta access, and credit as a backer on our website.

Player-designed hull frame, 45 tech advances, name a star, named in game credits, digital art packet, two special hull frames, download of original game soundtrack, six-month subscription, beta access, and credit as a backer on our website.

Your likeness as a leader (military or civil) in the game, player-designed hull frame, name a star, named in game credits, digital art packet, two special hull frames, download of original game soundtrack, six-month subscription, beta access, and credit as a backer on our website.

Three special hull frames, 55 tech advances, your likeness as a leader (military or civil) in the game, player-designed hull frame, name a star, named in game credits, digital art packet, download of original game soundtrack, two special hull frames, six-month subscription, beta access, and credit as a backer on our website.

Four special hull frames, 65 tech advances,  your likeness as a leader (military or civil) in the game, player-designed hull frame, name a star, named in game credits, digital art packet, two special hull frames, download of original game soundtrack, one-year subscription, beta access, and credit as a backer on our website.

Music packet - the musician gets the right to develop up to ten pieces of music for use in the game, upon formal approval by development team. Artist will be credited as a contributing artist in the game credits.

Artist packet - the artist gets the right to develop up to ten pieces of art (choice of 3D models or 2D illustrations) for use in the game, upon formal approval by development team. Artist will be credited as a contributing artist in the game credits.

Writer packet  - The right to write one piece of written fiction set in Takamo Universe, and (subject to approval of the content by the development team) the right to release it commercially independent of the game upon condition that the story or portions of the story may appear within Takamo Universe without payment of further royalties to either party. We will promote your title within the game upon completion of the written story.

Special hull series (6 ships), 75 tech advances,  your likeness as a leader (military or civil) in the game, player-designed hull frame, name a star, named as an "Associate Producer" in game and website credits, digital art packet, two special hull frames, download of original game soundtrack, one year subscription, and beta access.

Game voiceover, special starbase, special hull series (6 ships), 85 tech advances,  your likeness as a leader (military or civil) in the game, player-designed hull frame, name a star, named as an "Associate Producer" in game and website credits, digital art packet, two special hull frames, download of original game soundtrack, one-year subscription, and beta access.

Player-designed hull series (6 ships), special hull series (6 ships), 85 tech advances, your likeness as a leader (military or civil) in the game, player-designed hull frame, name a star, named as an "Associate Producer" in game and website credits, digital art packet, two special hull frames, download of original game soundtrack, one-year subscription, and beta access.
